title: Number of customer transactions at the Home Depot and Lowe 's worldwide 2011 to 2018
summary: Overall Home Depot is gradually increasing, Lowe's is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Home Depot, and lastly, 2. Lowe's.
Lowe's reported the lowest Number of customer transactions in millions about 804.0 in Year 2012
The difference of Number of customer transactions in millions between Home Depot and Lowe's is greater at Year 2014 compared to the Year 2011.
